pages.title: Titanium
pages.text: Titanium is a strong metal, more than enough to be used as a tool or armor by itself. Titanium alloys are hard to make, but the results are hard to disagree with.$(br)An alternative to Diamond, Titanium tools and armor are more durable and just as enchantable than their counterpart, but not as strong or lightweight.
Titanium can be found in the Overworld between Y level -64 and 24 with a tendency to be in the middle, in decent-sized clusters.
